fullText: This is a world in which more is more, and then some, and the impulse is to shield your eyes from the exuberant vulgarity of it all. But wait — let the gaudy spectacle wash over you, and you may find, to your surprise, that you're actually enjoying yourself.
dtliExcerpt: This is a world in which more is more, and then some, and the impulse is to shield your eyes from the exuberant vulgarity of it all. But wait — let the gaudy spectacle wash over you, and you may find, to your surprise, that you're actually enjoying yourself.
